data.title: Laundry: Top Ten Things to Keep in Mind
data.desc: COMTEX is a not-for-profit Shared Services Corporation governed by its own Board of Directors and managed by an on-site Chief Operating Officer. COMTEX was established to provide high quality, cost effective laundry and linen service functions. In cooperation, and with the support of the City of Columbus, this bold joint venture brings two superior healthcare providers together to establish a state-of-the-art processing plant and service provider within the City limits of Columbus.

data.title: The Jenroll Hybrid from JENSEN sets new standards within ironing performance.
data.desc: The Jenroll Hybrid is a true two-in-one machine. By combining a conventional deep chest section with a calendar section comprising 3 steam heated cylinders, it is now possible to iron flatwork at very high speeds, while maintaining a superior finishing quality without leaving tape marks in the linen. In addition, the Jenroll Hybrid reduces the wear and shrinkage of the linen thanks to frictionless transport through the calendar section, gently applying heat to both sides of the linen by use of medium steam pressure.

data.title: Stunning new Jensen facility
data.desc: A multi-generational family owned and operated uniform and linen supplier in the Boston, Massachusetts area, Crown Uniform & Linen Service, has reached the completion of a new ground-up 100,000+ sq. ft. facility. This facility is nothing short of stunning - no details were left unturned. They partnered with JENSEN to assist in the plant design, and to supply several technologies; automated soil sort system, automated soil-side and clean-side rail system, complete batch washing and drying system, vacuum transport system, and complete garment transport and sortation system
